about_the_game:
You can purchase the art book (digital edition) of 'Ancient Weapon Holly.'

This 60-page art book provides an exhaustive look at Holly's character design, monster design, dungeon design, and other in-game art elements, even featuring designs that were discarded.

We recommend this for:
・Those interested in the art of 'Ancient Weapon Holly'
・Those curious about the behind-the-scenes of the development
・Those who want to see the designs that didn't make the cut
・Those keen on understanding the development process of the art

Dive into the world of 'Ancient Weapon Holly' and enjoy!

name: Ancient Weapon Holly - Artbook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dive deep into the stunning visual world of the game! Our art book not only showcases Holly's character design, monster concepts, and intricate dungeon layouts but also features the unreleased designs that didn't make the cut. A complete visual feast for fans!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
